qrManagement.title: QR Management
qrManagement.description: Manage your QR codes for easy access to services.

qrManagement.qrDownloadErrorDescription: An error occurred while downloading the QR code. Please try again.
qrManagement.qrDownloadSuccessDescription: The QR code has been downloaded to your device.
